title: Supply shift doesn't shift factor demand

content.prompt: A change in which of the following will NOT cause a shift in the demand curve for a factor of production?

choices.label: Demand for the goods produced by the factor
Prices of the goods produced by the factor

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
